tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (S (NP (NN Swimming)) (VP (VBD lost))) (, ,) (S (NP-TMP (NN night)) (PP (IN in) (PP (IN with) (NP (NNP Mike))))) (CC and) (S (NP (JJ hot) (NN chocolate)) (VP (VBD won))) (. !)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [lost/VBD nsubj>Swimming/NN punct>,/, conj:and>[night/NN dep>[Mike/NNP case>in/IN case>with/IN]] cc>and/CC conj:and>[won/VBD nsubj>[chocolate/NN amod>hot/JJ]] punct>!/.]
